channel.title: Android Users Club
channel.description:
A thread to discuss anything android related from news to apps.
I just recently picked up the Samsung Galaxy S4. Looking for cool stuff to do with it, anyone got app suggestions? Probably the two best apps I've found so far are unified remote which allows you to remote control programs on your computer from the phone with a whole host of remotes including a mouse and keyboard emulator and Samsung Link/Video which is some super handy bloatware that lets me stream videos from my Computer's HDD to my phone over wifi.
Currently I'm trying to get a [url='https://mymagicpudding.blogspot.co.uk/2013/02/making-pipboy-3000.html']pipboy emulator[/url] to work, but I'm getting [url='https://i.imgur.com/xkiz5Eo.png']this[/url] error message. I think the problem is that my file directory looks like this: /storage/extSdCard/pipboy. I suspect the app isn't compatible with Jelly Bean. I'm currently looking at the app's [url='https://github.com/tompudding/pipboy']source code[/url] and hunting for a relatively obvious way to change the directory in the code to match the directory on my phone but I have no idea what I'm doing.

on the plus side I get unlimited 3G data

Read full topic

item.title: Android Users Club
item.dc:creator: papernick
item.description:
long post incoming

Cliffhanger: Great way to follow TV shows. Pretty UI.
Chrome: A bit sluggish, but the best in terms of features.
Krome: Get Android notifications on your PC (on desktop Chrome).
Eye In Sky: Best weather app.
Nova Launcher: Best launcher.
Fabrik: ebook reader with cloud syncing.
Feedly: Best RSS feeds reader.
Poweramp: Music player with lots of options and skins.
Pocket Casts: Podcast app.
Pocket: Cross-platform read-it-later app.
PushBullet: Send files from your pc to your phone wirelessly.
Shush!: Gives option when you mute your phone to restore sound volume after x amount of hours.
Songkick: Lets you know when a band you like is coming to your city or town.
Timely: Best alarm clock.
Tweedle: Clean looking twitter app.

Also, get the Google Keyboard or Swype instead of the god-awful samsung one.

As far as games go, get Kingdom Rush. Best android game by a mile.

Read full topic

item.title: Android Users Club
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
A thread to discuss anything android related from news to apps.

I just recently picked up the Samsung Galaxy S4. Looking for cool stuff to do with it, anyone got app suggestions? Probably the two best apps I’ve found so far are unified remote which allows you to remote control programs on your computer from the phone with a whole host of remotes including a mouse and keyboard emulator and Samsung Link/Video which is some super handy bloatware that lets me stream videos from my Computer’s HDD to my phone over wifi.

Currently I’m trying to get a pipboy emulator to work, but I’m getting this error message. I think the problem is that my file directory looks like this: /storage/extSdCard/pipboy. I suspect the app isn’t compatible with Jelly Bean. I’m currently looking at the app’s source code and hunting for a relatively obvious way to change the directory in the code to match the directory on my phone but I have no idea what I’m doing.

Read full topic
